first_interaction.speaker: Clouie
first_interaction.text: Hi there! Parang ngayon lang kita nakita dito. May hinahanap ka ba?

first_interaction.speaker: Clouie
first_interaction.text: Kung gusto mo ng tulong, sabihin mo lang — baka may alam ako.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Clouie
repeated_interaction.text: Oh, ikaw ulit! Naayos mo na ba ‘yung inaasikaso mo?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Clouie
repeated_interaction.text: Kung may kailangan ka pa, nandito lang ako ha.
